text: James Hamilton (born 16 August 1906) was a Scottish professional footballer who played for Girvan Juniors, Hamilton Academical, Ayr United, Rochdale, Wrexham, Carlisle United and Chester, as a full back. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:Date of death missing Category:Scottish footballers Category:Hamilton Academical F.C. players Category:Ayr United F.C. players Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:Chester F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football fullbacks
title: Jimmy Hamilton (footballer, born 1906)
